# Kraidyl Feats
## Overview
***The following feats are available to*** ***[[Kraidyl|kraidyl]]****** characters.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Kraidyl|kraidyl]] feats introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---

- [[Deadly Maw]]
- [[Expanding Torso]]
- [[Grabbing Jaws]]
- [[Hypnotic Predator]]
- [[Patient Predator]]
